Message #1 le 2013-10-29 @ 11:40:06 par TortureX:
[Â–]HirezChrisLHIREZ STUDIOS LEAD PROGRAMMER [score hidden] 11 minutes de ça
So for the next patch we are going to have better feedback on the number of total players and your ranking within the league.

As far as this season goes, this is the numbers that exist at this moment:

Conquest League has 7,105 players. 2,083 have completed at least 10 games (does not have to be wins) that qualifies them for the season completion. The 20% is based on players that have completed 10 games.

Arena League has 4,601 players. 773 of these have completed 10 games.

Of course these numbers will change before the season closes on Friday.

Hope this clarifies some things for you guy

http://www.reddit.com/r/Smite/comments/1pgq3m/league_leaderboard/


Donc en bas de 10 games tu restes bronze, encore la tu peux rester bronze :D
